nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:dye","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Toxic Arrow Poison\",\"color\":\"green\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Consumed on arrow shot\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"Arrows deal an additional\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"10% \",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"of damage as poison\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"and reduce healing by \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"24%\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"over \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"4 \",\"color\":\"aqua\"},{\"text\":\"seconds.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"UNCOMMON ARROW POISON\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"TOXIC_ARROW_POISON"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
